item.title: Zeros of fractional derivatives of polynomials
item.description: arXiv:2301.08149v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We investigate the behavior of fractional derivatives of polynomials. In particular, we consider the locations and the asymptotic behaviour of their zeros and give bounds for their Mahler measure.
item.dc:creator: Torre Caparatta, Sebastian Pauli, Filip Saidak
